summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.9°C) and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4213 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 9798 lux), cloud levels (up 1799 m), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 215.7m lower than yesterday, 706.6m lower than the past week, 1798.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 851.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1557.8m and 2650m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and calm and still conditions are expected. Periods of rain anticipated, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
